overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: Znaj.by is a revolutionary educational platform that transforms traditional school management into a digital ecosystem. As the React Native developer, I built mobile applications that serve teachers, parents, and students, creating seamless communication and efficient educational processes.

challenge.title: Educational Challenges
challenge.description: Traditional school management systems are fragmented, inefficient, and fail to provide seamless communication between all educational stakeholders. Schools need comprehensive digital transformation.

problems.title: Fragmented Communication
problems.description: Disconnected systems between teachers, parents, and students

problems.title: Manual Administrative Tasks
problems.description: Time-consuming paperwork and routine administrative processes

problems.title: Limited Progress Tracking
problems.description: Parents struggle to monitor their children's academic progress

problems.title: Complex Payment Systems
problems.description: Difficulty managing school-related expenses and payments

solution.title: Comprehensive Educational Solution
solution.description: I developed a complete mobile ecosystem that connects all participants in the educational process through intuitive React Native applications with real-time synchronization and smart automation.

features.title: Digital Grade Book & Registry
features.description: Real-time electronic gradebook with class registry that automatically tracks student performance and attendance.

features.title: Parent Engagement Portal
features.description: Comprehensive tools for parents to track children's progress, communicate with teachers, and manage school payments.

features.title: Teacher Management Tools
features.description: Streamlined interface for educators to manage classes, assignments, grades, and communicate with parents efficiently.

features.title: Student Learning Hub
features.description: Focused environment for students to access assignments, track their progress, and engage with educational content.
